mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_id, product_name, product_price, product_size, product_color, product_main_img, product_detail_img, product_detail, product_category, product_url, product_stock) values (product_seq.NEXTVAL, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_size}, #{product_color}, #{product_main_img}, #{product_detail_img}, #{product_detail}, #{product_category}, #{product_url}, #{product_stock})
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_main_img, product_category from product ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_size, product_color, product_main_img, product_detail_img, product_url FROM product WHERE product_id = #{product_id}
